data.comment: The match has started.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 2, Leipzig apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Marcel Sabitzer. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Goal kick for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Leipzig.
Daniel Siebert signals a Leipzig throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Leipzig push upfield but Daniel Siebert quickly pulls them for offside.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 9, B. Munich have a goal kick.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich's Kingsley Coman misses with an attempt on goal.
Daniel Siebert awards Leipzig a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Leipzig push forward at Allianz Arena and Christopher Nkunku gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined B. Munich defence.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Leipzig are pushing forward but Christopher Nkunku's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Munich.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 19, Leipzig have a goal kick.
Christopher Nkunku is on target to give Leipzig a 0-1 advantage.
Emil Forsberg instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Leipzig.
Leipzig are caught offside.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
In the minute 25, The home team replace Javi Martinez with Jamal Musiala.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Leipzig.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Benjamin Pavard for B. Munich drives towards goal at Allianz Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 29, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Goal! Jamal Musiala levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 30, Kingsley Coman with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 32, The match at Allianz Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Amadou Haidara, who is down injured.
Leipzigâ€™s Amadou Haidara is on his feet again at Allianz Arena.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 34, Goal! Thomas Muller gives B. Munich a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Kingsley Coman.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Goal! Justin Kluivert equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Great play from Amadou Haidara to set up the goal.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Leipzig's half.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Leipzig.
Leipzig drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Daniel Siebert waits before resuming play because Amadou Haidara for Leipzig is still down.
Daniel Siebert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Leipzig's Amadou Haidara looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 44, Throw-in B. Munich.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Christopher Nkunku returns to the field for Leipzig after picking up a slight injury.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
The first-half has come to a close in Munich.
Christopher Nkunku is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second-half is underway at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal! Emil Forsberg heads Leipzig into a 2-3 lead.
That's a fine assist from Angelino.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Munich.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Allianz Arena, Nordi Mukiele has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Leipzig are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
Goal kick for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 55, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 56, Daniel Siebert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Leipzig.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Leipzig.
Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Leipzig's area.
Leipzig needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 60, Daniel Siebert awards Leipzig a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Yussuf Poulsen is replacing Emil Forsberg for the away team.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of B. Munich.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
In the minute 63, In Munich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Munich Leipzig drive forward through Dayot Upamecano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 64, Free kick B. Munich.
Serge Gnabry is replacing Leroy Sane for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Kingsley Coman (B. Munich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 66, Free kick B. Munich.
B. Munich push forward at Allianz Arena and Robert Lewandowski gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Leipzig defence.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 71, Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Julian Nagelsmann is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Arena with Kevin Kampl replacing Marcel Sabitzer.
The away team have replaced Nordi Mukiele with Dani Olmo. This is the third substitution made today by Julian Nagelsmann.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Leipzig.
Thomas Muller (B. Munich) nets with a header to make it 3-3 at Allianz Arena.
Great play from Kingsley Coman to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, In Munich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 78, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leipzig's half?
Alexander Sorloth is on a sub for Amadou Haidara for Leipzig.
Leipzig make their fifth substitution with Willi Orban replacing Justin Kluivert.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Leipzig.
In the minute 83, B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chris Richards is on a sub for Jerome Boateng for B. Munich.
Douglas Costa is replacing Kingsley Coman for the home team.
In the minute 84, Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
In the minute 86, B. Munich drives forward and Jamal Musiala gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In the minute 88, Important block from the Leipzig defence as Serge Gnabry fires in a strike for B. Munich.
Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Leipzig's area.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
The match has come to a close in Munich. The final score is 3-3.
